'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a {{lc:Pet}} in {{poe2}}. Kaz was the pet dog of Fleet Master Ko stationed at Hasongo, and made good friends with [Ishiza](/ishiza/) and [Maia](/maia/). He made it through the cataclysm unscathed. ## Description {{Description |{{#var:description}}}} ## Acquisition {{#arraymap: {{#var:location}}|;|x|x|\n}} ## Trivia * Kaz is named after [Kazunori Aruga](/kazunoriAruga/), the lead artist for {{game|poe2}}. He would often use the doge meme during development of Pillars of Eternity. ## Companion reactivity {| class="wikitable" ! width=100px | Companion ! width=100% | Dialogue |- | [Maia](/maia/) | ''"I remember this little soldier! Glad to see you made it, friend."
Maia kneels down to scratch the dog's ears. [Ishiza](/ishiza/) hops closer and cocks his head.'' {{topic|Animal Kindness}} {{hr}} To which he responds:
''He prances in place, wagging his tail happily as he looks at Maia.'' |- | [Edér](/eder/) | (Second time interacting with Kaz, if Maia is in the party)
''"Look at that! Must be working for the same company."
He grins at Maia.'' {{hr}} ''"Uh oh. We got a ferocious beast watching us. And he looks like he's got a very itchy belly."'' |}
